item.title: Underbar in python
item.description: 0407 edit #Introduction I’m sorry for the beginner’s bare post, but I believe that there are some beginners who have the same problem. #Underbar coming out a little Why don’t you read people’s codes or reference books and come out? This is an underbar! Underbar like _ H,W,_ = img.shape First, __main__ Why is there an underbar? Like That’s the story this time. I found a god article while I was worried about this time as well, so I will try to flesh it and chew it based on it.
